channel.title: HOME on Sven Piller
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Sven Piller

item.title: SNOWHUNT
item.description: SNOWHUNT is your mobile scavenger hunt app while doing winter sports! Introduction Snowhunt is a mobile application prototype developed within the second part of the CareerFoundry Certified UX Designer Program: UX Immersion. In this expose I will describe the history of the developement process of this app. Initial Goals “Casual skiers need a way to solve some quests during their sport sessions because they want an extra motivation for doing sports.
